cartaPolicy.bookingGuidance: Book all international travel through Navan (TripActions). Direct bookings require manager approval and may not be reimbursed.
cartaPolicy.approvalWorkflow: International trips require manager approval 14+ days in advance. Executive-level trips (C-suite meetings) require VP approval.
cartaPolicy.expensePolicy: Per diem rates apply based on destination. See Carta Travel Policy for daily limits. Premium economy approved for flights over 6 hours.
cartaPolicy.travelInsurance: All international travel is automatically covered under Carta's corporate travel insurance. Carry your insurance card.

requirements.title: ESTA Authorization
requirements.description: Electronic System for Travel Authorization required for Visa Waiver Program countries.
details: Apply at esta.cbp.dhs.gov at least 72 hours before travel
Valid for 2 years or until passport expires

requirements.title: Valid Passport
requirements.description: Machine-readable passport valid for 6 months beyond your stay.
details: Valid for 6 months beyond planned stay

requirements.title: Return Ticket
requirements.description: Proof of onward or return travel from the United States.
details: Round-trip ticket or onward travel proof

requirements.title: Business Documentation
requirements.description: Documents proving business purpose of visit.
details: Invitation letter from US company (if applicable)

requirements.title: Travel Insurance
requirements.description: Comprehensive travel and health insurance.
details: US healthcare is expensive - ensure adequate coverage
Emergency evacuation coverage included in Carta policy

entryNotes: ESTA is NOT a visa - it's travel authorization
Can be denied entry even with valid ESTA
CBP officer makes final entry decision

requirements.title: UK Electronic Travel Authorisation
requirements.description: ETA required for visa-free visitors from 2024.
details: Apply via UK ETA app or online

requirements.title: Valid Passport
requirements.description: Passport valid for the duration of your stay.

requirements.title: Permitted Business Activities
requirements.description: Understand what business activities are allowed without a work visa.
details: Cannot take employment or provide services
Cannot receive payment from UK sources

requirements.title: Business Invitation Letter
requirements.description: Letter from UK host company or event organizer.

entryNotes: UK is NOT part of Schengen - separate entry rules apply
Border officer may ask about business purpose

requirements.title: Electronic Travel Authorization (eTA)
requirements.description: Required for visa-exempt foreign nationals flying to Canada.
details: Valid for 5 years or until passport expires

requirements.title: Valid Passport
requirements.description: Machine-readable passport required.

requirements.title: Business Visitor Status
requirements.description: Understand business visitor rules vs. work permit requirements.
details: Business meetings and site visits allowed
Primary income source must be outside Canada

requirements.title: Invitation Letter
requirements.description: Letter from Canadian host organization.

requirements.title: ArriveCAN (Optional)
requirements.description: Optional digital declaration for faster border processing.

entryNotes: Border officer determines length of stay

requirements.title: e-Visa (VIVIS)
requirements.description: Electronic visa required for US, Canadian, and Australian citizens.
details: Apply at least 72 hours before travel
Valid for 2 years with multiple entries

requirements.title: Valid Passport
requirements.description: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months.
details: Valid for 6 months from entry date
At least one blank page required

requirements.title: Yellow Fever Vaccination
requirements.description: May be required depending on origin and travel areas.
details: Required if arriving from endemic countries

requirements.title: Business Invitation Letter
requirements.description: Letter from Brazilian host company.

requirements.title: Currency Declaration
requirements.description: Declare amounts over R$10,000 or equivalent.
details: Complete e-DBV form if carrying over R$10,000
Applies to cash and traveler's checks
No limit on credit/debit card use

requirements.title: Valid Passport
requirements.description: Passport valid for 3+ months beyond planned stay.

requirements.title: Schengen Area Rules
requirements.description: 90 days per 180-day period across all Schengen countries.
details: Time in other Schengen countries counts

requirements.title: ETIAS (Coming Soon)
requirements.description: European Travel Information and Authorization System launching 2025.

requirements.title: Travel Insurance
requirements.description: Health insurance with €30,000 minimum coverage recommended.

entryNotes: No visa required for US/UK citizens
Cash still widely used in Germany

requirements.title: Valid Passport
requirements.description: Passport must be valid for duration of stay.

requirements.title: Visit Japan Web
requirements.description: Pre-register immigration and customs information online.
details: Receive QR code for faster processing
Can add after arrival but slower

requirements.title: Return/Onward Ticket
requirements.description: Proof of departure within visa-free period.

requirements.title: Business Purpose Documentation
requirements.description: Documents supporting business visit purpose.

entryNotes: Visa-free for most Western passport holders
Register on Visit Japan Web before travel
Business cards are very important in Japan
